FuncDef: This commands assigns a bi-directional forwarding (BFD) session providing heart-beat mechanism for the given VRRP/SRRP instance. There can be only one BFD session assigned to any given VRRP/SRRP instance, but there can be multiple SRRP/VRRP sessions using the same BFD session. If the interface used is configured with centralized BFD, the BFD transmit and receive intervals need to be set to at least 300 ms.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the service ID of the interface running BFD. If no svc-id is specified then it indicates that the interface is a network interface in the Base router instance. Values-{id | svc-name}.
Specifies the name of the interface running BFD, up to 32 characters.
Specifies the destination address to be used for the BFD session.
Specifies a service name, up to 64 characters.
